name: document-translation
description: Use SAP Translation Hub to accelerate and streamline translation of software and documents. Benefit from AI-powered machine translation and intelligent multilingual data reuse, consumable via an intuitive user interface and workflow, a range of APIs, or existing integrations in SAP products and services. Includes Document Translation service and SAP Translation Hub for software translation.

servicePlans.name: default
servicePlans.description: Default service plan for SAP Translation Hub. Requires subscription of the default (application) service plan.

servicePlans.name: free
servicePlans.description: Free service plan for SAP Translation Hub. Requires subscription of the free application plan. Please note, only community support is available for free service plans and these are not subject to SLAs. Use of free tier service plans are subject to additional terms and conditions as provided in the Business Technology Platform Supplemental Terms and Conditions linked in the Additional Links tab displayed in the Service tile.
